entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
